You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesS S] > &scaron;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Scaron;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0160/index.htm U+00160].
  * `&scaron;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0161/index.htm U+00161].
